name: Goovide
description:
Goovide is a puzzle/platformer where you control an army of little goo balls. They all move at the same time and clicking on the screen will divide each ball into two balls, roughly two thirds the size of their parent ball.

Thanks to 'bart' on OpenGameArt.org for the soundtrack, all other sounds were made by me and all art assets were made by me.

Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3
